attributes.name: IBM Write at Coordinates
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Enters text in emulator at specified location

nestedParameters.name: Row number (Starts with 1 at top of emulator)
nestedParameters.id: Row number (Starts with 1 at top of emulator)

nestedParameters.name: Column number (Starts with 1 at left of emulator)
nestedParameters.id: Column number (Starts with 1 at left of emulator)

nestedParameters.name: Text to Write
nestedParameters.id: Text to Write

nestedParameters.name: Clear the current data in the field before writing?
nestedParameters.id: Clear the current data in the field before writing?

attributes.name: IBM Connect to Emulator
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Connects to a running emulator based on the session letter

nestedParameters.name: Path to folder containing DLL file
nestedParameters.id: Path to folder containing DLL file

nestedParameters.name: Name of DLL file (extension NOT needed)
nestedParameters.id: Name of DLL file (extension NOT needed)

nestedParameters.name: Session Letter (A for example)
nestedParameters.id: Session Letter (A for example)

attributes.name: IBM Disconnect from Emulator
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Disconnects from the connected emulator session

attributes.name: IBM Get Text at Coordinate
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Takes in a coordinate(emulator row/col coordinate starting at 1) and length of text to return from that line, then returns the text located there

nestedParameters.name: Row number (Starts with 1 at top of emulator)
nestedParameters.id: Row number (Starts with 1 at top of emulator)

nestedParameters.name: Column number (Starts with 1 at left of emulator)
nestedParameters.id: Column number (Starts with 1 at left of emulator)

nestedParameters.name: Text Length to Read
nestedParameters.id: Text Length to Read

nestedParameters.name: Application Name for Credentials
nestedParameters.id: Application Name for Credentials

nestedParameters.name: Username for Credentials
nestedParameters.id: Username for Credentials

nestedParameters.name: Is Username? Otherwise Password
nestedParameters.id: Is Username? Otherwise Password

attributes.name: IBM Send Special Control Key
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Sends special control key using keyboard mnemonic, which is escape character (default is @) + symbol. Examples: send @E for enter, send @T for tab.

nestedParameters.name: Sequence of characters that make up the keyboard mnemonics, ASCII characters representing the special function keys of the keyboard in the workstation
nestedParameters.id: Sequence of characters that make up the keyboard mnemonics, ASCII characters representing the special function keys of the keyboard in the workstation

attributes.name: IBM Bulk Write at Coordinates
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Enters text in bulk at specified locations.

nestedParameters.instructionalText: Expects JSON list object with fields 'text', 'row', and 'column' - for example a!toJson({{text:"test1",row:1,column:1},{text:"test2",row:5,column:5}})
nestedParameters.name: Bulk Text & Rol/Col Coordinates (JSON)
nestedParameters.id: Bulk Text & Rol/Col Coordinates (JSON)

nestedParameters.name: Clear the current data in the field before writing?
nestedParameters.id: Clear the current data in the field before writing?

attributes.name: IBM Find Text
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Takes in a text string and returns the row/col location (integer array) in the emulator. Returns null if not found

nestedParameters.name: Text to Locate
nestedParameters.id: Text to Locate

attributes.name: IBM Get Text at Line
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Takes in a line number (emulator row number, starts at 1) and returns the text at that line

nestedParameters.name: Row number (Starts with 1 at top of emulator)
nestedParameters.id: Row number (Starts with 1 at top of emulator)

attributes.name: IBM Go to Text Position
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Takes in a text string (case-sensitive) and goes to that position in emulator

nestedParameters.name: Text to Locate
nestedParameters.id: Text to Locate

nestedParameters.name: Go to first character of word? Otherwise last character
nestedParameters.id: Go to first character of word? Otherwise last character

nestedParameters.name: Row Offset
nestedParameters.id: Row Offset

nestedParameters.name: Column Offset
nestedParameters.id: Column Offset

attributes.name: IBM Write at Label
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Writes text in emulator at specified label (case-sensitive) with optional offset

nestedParameters.name: Field Label
nestedParameters.id: Field Label

nestedParameters.name: Write at first character of word? Otherwise last character. Use last character & column offset of 2 to write text one full space to the right of a label end
nestedParameters.id: Write at first character of word? Otherwise last character. Use last character & column offset of 2 to write text one full space to the right of a label end

attributes.name: IBM Go to Coordinates
attributes.description: IBM3270Library:v2.0.0: Takes in a row and column then moves the cursor to that position in emulator
